# Devcontainer features

Use a customized and presetted containers.

| Feature                                                      | Description                                                       |
| ------------------------------------------------------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [typescript-node](../src/typescript-node/README.md) | Preset of Node.js development container with preinstalled extensions and settings |
